analyzed: aṭṭha ca puggala dhamma dasā te

original: Cando ca na bhāsati na phusso;
analyzed: candaḥ ca na bhāsati na phussaḥ

original: Ko nu tvaṁ tidivā mahiṁ upāgā.
analyzed: kaḥ nu tvam tidivā mahim upāgāḥ
yathā ca te adhigatam idam vimāna
tad anupadam avacāsi iṅgha puṭṭha iti
dhammam ca api tathā iva bhikkhu saṅgha

original: Mā ca pāṇavadhaṁ vividhaṁ carassu asuciṁ,
analyzed: mā ca pāṇa vadham vividham carassu asuci

original: Na hi pāṇesu asaññataṁ avaṇṇayiṁsu sappaññā;
analyzed: na hi pāṇesu asaññatam a vaṇṇayisu sappaññā
mā ca para janassa rakkhitam pi
na hi musāvādam a vaṇṇayisu sappaññā
te mam tattha vadhisu bhoga hetu

original: Tato paraṁ na me vijjati aññaṁ;

analyzed: sugatim camhi gataḥ sukham ca pattaḥ

original: Ye ca te satataṁ suṇanti dhammaṁ,
analyzed: ye ca te satatam suṇanti dhamma
id ca eke hi sam ed ca mantayanti

original: Iti me sati agamā divā divassa;
analyzed: iti me sati agamā divā divassa
na ca te punar upenti gabbhaseyya
parinibbāna gatā hi sīti bhūtā ati
